title: NHL LED Scoreboard configuration
description: Configuration that controls the NHL LED scoreboard rgb matrix application

debug.title: Debug
debug.description: Enable the debug mode which show on your console what the scoreboard

loglevel.title: loglevel
loglevel.description: Level of logs to show in output.  Can be DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR, CRITICAL  DEBUG is same as setting debug to true

live_mode.title: Live Mode
live_mode.description: Enable the live mode which show live game data of your favorite team.

time_format.title: Time Format
time_format.description: The format in which the game start time will be displayed. (12h or 24h)

end_of_day.title: End Of Day
end_of_day.description: A 24-hour time you wish to consider the end of the previous day before starting to display the current day's games.

location.title: Location
location.description: Overrides latitude and longitude lookup by IP address.  Used by dimmer and weather

live_game_refresh_rate.title: Live Game Refresh Rate
live_game_refresh_rate.description: The rate at which a live game will call the NHL API to catch the new data. Do not go under 10 seconds as it's pointless and will affect your scoreboard performance.(Default 15 sec)

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: List of preferred teams. First one in the list is considered the favorite. If left empty, the scoreboard will be in off_day mode

items.title: Team
items.description: Team in teams list selected for display

sog_display_frequency.title: Shots on Goal Display Frequency
sog_display_frequency.description: How often the shots on goal are updated

goal_animations.title: Goal Animations
goal_animations.description: The goal animations can be set for both teams of just the preferred teams

pref_team_only.title: Preferred Team Only Animation
pref_team_only.description: Show only your preferred team goal animation or show both

states.title: States
states.description: If the live mode is enabled, the scoreboard will go through different states depending on the current situation. For each state, you can define which of the available board you want the scoreboard to show. For example, if one of my preferred team has a game scheduled on the current day, during the day, the scoreboard will be in the scheduled state. I personally like to have all the data possible shown during the day so I'll set the all the boards in the scheduled setting.

off_day.title: Off Day
off_day.description: Offday is when your team is not playing. This could be off season as well

scheduled.title: Scheduled Gameday
scheduled.description: Scheduled is for when you team will be playing

intermission.title: Intermission
intermission.description: What to display during itermission betweeen periods

post_game.title: Post Game
post_game.description: What to display after the game is done

items.title: Post Game Boards
items.description: Boards to display for post game

boards.title: Boards
boards.description: All possible boards that can be displayed and their settings

scoreticker.title: Scoreticker
scoreticker.description: This is basically like the generic score ticker you see during a game on TV of sports news showing the result or the status of the other games in the league

preferred_teams_only.title: Preferred Teams Only Display
preferred_teams_only.description: Choose between showing all the games of the day or just the ones your preferred teams are playing

rotation_rate.title: Scoreticker Rotation Rate
rotation_rate.description: Duration at which each games are shown on screen.

seriesticker.title: Series Ticker
seriesticker.description: Just like the scoreticker, this is showing playoff series status with a table sporting each game scores and result.

preferred_teams_only.title: Preferred Teams Only Ticker
preferred_teams_only.description: Choose between showing all series of the current round of playoff or just the ones your preferred teams are part of.

rotation_rate.title: Seriesticker Rotation Rate
rotation_rate.description: Duration at which each series are shown on screen.

standings.title: Standings
standings.description: Self-explanatory, it shows the current standings. Currently, you can choose between showing standings by conference or by divisions. Wildcard standings are coming soon.

preferred_standings_only.title: Preferred Standings Only
preferred_standings_only.description: Choose between showing all the standings or only the the preferred division and conference.

standing_type.title: Standing Type
standing_type.description: Option to choose the type of standings to display. conference if set by default.

clock.title: Clock
clock.description: Show the current time either in 24h or 12h format.

duration.title: Display Duration
duration.description: How long to show the clock

hide_indicator.title: Hide Network Indicator
hide_indicator.description: Hide the red bar no network indicator on the bottom

preferred_team_colors.title: Preferred Team Colours
preferred_team_colors.description: Use your first preferred team's colors for clock.  The primary color will be used for clock numbers, while the team text color will be used for the date/weather and AM/PM

clock_rgb.title: Clock RGB
clock_rgb.description: Set the clock numbers to the RGB value if preferred_team_colors set to false.  This must be in the form R,G,B

date_rgb.title: Date RGB
date_rgb.description: Set the date/weather and AM/PM text to the RGB value if preferred_team_colors set to false.  This must be in the form R,G,B ie. 230,230,23

flash_seconds.title: Flash Seconds Indicator
flash_seconds.description: Flash the seconds (:) if true.  If set to false, dont show the (:)

weather.title: Weather
weather.description: Settings for the weather data provider

enabled.title: Weather Enabled
enabled.description: Enable the weather thread to get your local weather.

view.title: Weather Board View
view.description: Weather board full (3 page) or summary view (1 page)

units.title: Units
units.description: Units to use for displaying the weather(metric or imperial)

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The time to flip through the pages in the weather board.  If there are no alerts, this will be 3 pages, if there are alerts a 4th is added.  Minimum 30 seconds duration

data_feed.title: Data Feed
data_feed.description: Where is the observation data coming from. You can use EC for Environment Canada, OWM for Open Weather Map (requires API KEY from https://openweathermap.org/api)

owm_apikey.title: OWM API Key
owm_apikey.description: API key required for when you use OpenWeatherMAP.  https://openweathermap.org/api

update_freq.title: Weather Update Frequency
update_freq.description: How often in minutes to refresh the weather and alerts feeds.

show_on_clock.title: Show Weather on Clock
show_on_clock.description: Add the last observed temperature and humidity to the bottom of the clock board

forecast_enabled.title: Forecast Enabled
forecast_enabled.description: Enable the weather forecast thread to get your local weather forecast up to 3 days.

forecast_days.title: Forecast Days
forecast_days.description: Number of forecast days to show (3 is the maximum).

forecast_update.title: Forecast Update Frequency
forecast_update.description: How often to update forecast.  This is in hours

wxalert.title: WX Alert
wxalert.description: Settings for the alerts data provider

alert_feed.title: Alert Feed
alert_feed.description: What data feed is provide alert data.  EC for Environment Canada or NWS for the National Weather Service in the US

update_freq.title: Alert Update Frequency
update_freq.description: How often in minutes to refresh the weather and alerts feeds.

nws_show_expire.title: NWS Show Warning Expiry
nws_show_expire.description: Show expire time (true) instead of effective time (false) of alert

show_alerts.title: Show Alerts
show_alerts.description: Get weather alerts and display them

alert_title.title: Alert Title
alert_title.description: On the initial alert page that will interrupt the normal board rotation, display on the top and bottom board the type of alert (WARNING, WATCH or ADVISORY)

scroll_alert.title: Scroll Alerts
scroll_alert.description: Scroll the text of the alert on the initial alert page.  If you select false, a static page will be displayed that is the same as the 4th page on the weather board

alert_duration.title: Alert Duration
alert_duration.description: How long to display alert board (in seconds)

show_on_clock.title: Show Alert on Clock
show_on_clock.description: Show Fred (active alert color square) on the bottom right corner of the clock board

screensaver.title: Screensaver
screensaver.description: Ability to turn off screen and back on at set times

animations.title: animations
animations.description: Show anuimation on screensaver start (true) or go straight to black screen (false)

start.title: Start Time
start.description: Time to start screensaver at (12h or 24h)

stop.title: Stop Time
stop.description: Time to end screensaver at (12h or 24h)

data_updates.title: Data Updates
data_updates.description: Update weather and NHL data while screen saver is active

motionsensor.title: Motion Sensor
motionsensor.description: Use motion sensor to stop screen saver

pin.title: Pin
pin.description: What gpio pin motion sensor is connected to

delay.title: Delay
delay.description: How long in seconds before there is no motion to turn screen saver back on

dimmer.title: Dimer
dimmer.description: Automatic setting of the brightness of scoreboard (software or hardware based)

source.title: source
source.description: Hardware (adafruit TSL2591 light sensor) or software (based on your IP address)

frequency.title: Dimmer Check Frequency
frequency.description: How often in minutes that the dimmer code checks to see if it should adjust the brightness

light_level_lux.title: light_level_lux
light_level_lux.description: If using a sensor, the level of light where the dimmer will change the brightness

mode.title: Dimmer Mode
mode.description: Run the dimmer always or just on offday

daytime.title: Day Time
daytime.description: What time is day time (can be 12 or 24 hour time)

nighttime.title: Night Time
nighttime.description: What time is night time (can be 12 or 24 hour time)

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: Value of offset in minutes for sunrise and sunset for automatic sunrise/sunset from location only.  Can be positive or negative

sunrise_brightness.title: Sunrise Brightness
sunrise_brightness.description: Value of brightness you want when it's daytime

sunset_brightness.title: Sunset Brightness
sunset_brightness.description: Value of brightness you want when it's night

enabled.title: Pushbutton Enabled
enabled.description: Use the pushbutton code or not

bonnet.title: Bonnet Type
bonnet.description: What type of adafruit rgb matrix interface is connected, hat or bonnet.  Defines what GIO pins are available.  True=bonnet false=HAT

pin.title: Pin
pin.description: The gpiozero number pin your button is connected to

reboot_duration.title: Reboot Hold Duration
reboot_duration.description: Number of seconds the PushButton must be held to trigger a reboot. 2 is the minimum value

reboot_override_process.title: Reboot Override Process
reboot_override_process.description: Process or script to use instead of the default /sbin/reboot command. Must have full path to script/process and no arguments for the process. If you need arguments, wrap in a script. If this is blank or the command/process does not exist, falls back to the default

display_reboot.title: Display Reboot
display_reboot.description: Show the word REBOOT in green on scoreboard when reboot triggered

poweroff_duration.title: Poweroff Hold Duration
poweroff_duration.description: Number of seconds the PushButton must be held to trigger a poweroff. Must be greater than reboot_duration. If reboot_duration is higher than poweroff_duration, the code will swap them

poweroff_override_process.title: Poweroff Override Process
poweroff_override_process.description: Process or script to use instead of the default /sbin/poweroff command. Must have full path to script/process and no arguments for the process. If you need arguments, wrap in a script.. If this is blank or the command/process does not exist, falls back to the default

display_halt.title: Display Halt
display_halt.description: Show the word ! HALT ! in red on scoreboard when poweroff triggered

state_triggered1.title: State Triggered #1
state_triggered1.description: The board you want displayed on button press. If this is blank falls back to the default board which is clock. Current boards available are scoreticker, standings, clock and weather

state_triggered1_process.title: State Trigger #1 Process
state_triggered1_process.description: Process or script to use when a single press of the button happens to switch the board. Must have full path to script/process and no arguments for the process. If you need arguments, wrap in a script.
